definition: (of a bird) to have become fully fledged/(fig.) (of a person) to have grown up (and become independent)/to be ready to spread one's wings
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
lit. to climb all over sb/fig. to take advantage of sb's weakness
to forget favors and violate justice (idiom); ingratitude to a friend/to kick a benefactor in the teeth
to fall out with sb and become hostile
unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
(coll.) to quit one's job in disgust
lit. to destroy the bridge after crossing the river (idiom)/fig. to abandon one's benefactor upon achieving one's goal
the elbow turns the wrong way/to favor an outsider instead of someone on one's own side (idiom)
pinyin: ge1 bo5 zhou3 chao2 wai4 guai3

definition: regardless of the law and of natural morality (idiom); maverick/undisciplined and out of control
not to know the immensity of heaven and earth/an exaggerated opinion of one's own abilities
pinyin: bu4 zhi1 tian1 gao1 di4 hou4
